pages.text: Filters determine what the maid can and cannot put into the chest. Filters need to be placed in the item frame aside the chest to take effect.(Now you can also attach it directly to the chest)

pages.title: Configure Filter
pages.text: Right click to open the filter for configuration, list items can be added from backpack or dragged in from jei. $(br2) the first button toggle black and white list, the white list can only put the items that the list has, the black list can store all items except the list items. $(br2)The second button toggles whether to match NBT tags exactly, such as durability, item naming, etc.
